metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37322 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description:
GCC c++filt v2.26 was discovered to contain a use-after-free vulnerabilityvia the component cplus-dem.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-37322` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-common - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-for-build - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-for-host - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-i686-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-i686-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-mips-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1

binutils-mips64el-linux-gnuabin32 - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-mipsel-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-mipsisa32r6-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-mipsisa32r6el-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-mipsisa64r6-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-mipsisa64r6-linux-gnuabin32 - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-mipsisa64r6el-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-mipsisa64r6el-linux-gnuabin32 - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-multiarch - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnuspe - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1
binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.30-15ubuntu1

binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.30-15ubuntu1

No subscription required

criterions.comment: binutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.30-15ubuntu1').
